title: Watch Face - Smart
summary: A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words.
developerAddress: 303 Abhishree Avenue, Opp. Hanuman Ji Temple, Nr. Nehrynagar Cross Road, Ambawadi, Ahmedabad 380015, Gujarat, INDIA
description: A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words/numbers. Not only will this beautiful watch face tell you the time, it can also keep you up-to-date with the weather conditions in your area. descriptionHTML:
A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words/numbers. Not only will this beautiful watch face tell you the time, it can also keep you up-to-date with the weather conditions in your area. The date format and time format changes automatically to the default of your main device.

Features:
- Weather in Celsius or Fahrenheit
- Customized backgrounds with color choices

comments: Crashes Phone app crashes and can't adjust settings, even after reinstall.
